page.title: 04Population,New Galloway
page.content: The New Galloway population consists of retired people(many from England)of adequate financial means, the families whose fathers are involved in Forestry and, in recent years, there has been a great influx of people whose attitudes and interests are very much different to the traditional type of family. This has caused dissension in the village between those who still exist in the "extended family" situation and those at the opposite extreme. As a result of our opinion poll, it seems that this rival feeling is becoming very deeply rooted which is unfortunate as the poll also showed that each side thought that the other had a lot to contribute to the village life. The poll showed that neither side was willing to move towards the other.
